titles.title: Due Process Restoration Act of 2023
Due Process Restoration Act of 2023
To authorize private parties to compel the Securities and Exchange Commission to seek sanctions by filing civil actions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Due Process Restoration Act of 2023
This bill allows a person who is the target of a Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) administrative proceeding to terminate the proceeding. The SEC is then authorized to bring a civil action in a U.S. district court against that person.
